about_the_game:
In this story based tower defense game with RPG elements you will take on the roles of two ambitious strategists who strive to defend the wealth of their nation against rebels and dragons.
Use the knowledge of your scientists, expand your arsenal and improve its abilities and be careful with your resources.

As you progress the story on your way to the final battle in this new fantasy world of Artera you will notice that your decisions can have unexpected consequences.
Not only do your choices alter the appearance of the levels but also your strategic options, the story and therefore the whole gameplay.
detailed_description:
Patch Notes

NEW UPDATE! 0.3.3 NEW: - Tech Tree complete - Time stop mechanism complete - "Wuselfaktor" / More life and details added CHANGES/FIXES: - corrected building grid aligning with the tiles in all levels (fixed) - placing-bug of buildings and turrets that snap into position when placed in the level, e.g. the Quarry or Mortar (fixed) - Missing assignment of the in-level Tech Tree-button, which made it unaccessable inside a level (fixed) - "Pause-treatment" for the in-level Tech Tree and Towerpedia: No clicking and no camera movement in the background possible - Repairable tower and quarry ruins during cutscene in level 003, which leads to getting stuck (fixed by "Pause-Treatment") - supernatural Wyms breaking through all walls? fixed. ---------------------------------------- NEW UPDATE ! 0.2.4 NEW - In-Level UI-placeholder for upcoming time-stopping-mechanic (not active nor visible yet) CHANGES - Sounds play locally - Sound volume adjustments - New Mortar-sounds - New Watch Tower shooting-sounds - Wyrm attack-sound volume adjustment - In-Level UI placement adjustments - New Tech Tree UI with the return of 'Developer Ellen' - Dynamic stats implemented to prepare for the level-up and stat boost mechanic inside the tech tree - Corrected point threshold for level ratings FIXES - Barrier no longer plays destruction sound when deselecting while placing from the building menu


About the Game

In this story based tower defense game with RPG elements you will take on the roles of two ambitious strategists who strive to defend the wealth of their nation against rebels and dragons. Use the knowledge of your scientists, expand your arsenal and improve its abilities and be careful with your resources. As you progress the story on your way to the final battle in this new fantasy world of Artera you will notice that your decisions can have unexpected consequences. Not only do your choices alter the appearance of the levels but also your strategic options, the story and therefore the whole gameplay.
